about_the_game:
While a lot of air traffic control is done for airplanes in the sky it is also important that airplanes move safely on the ground. Do you have what it takes to move airplanes safely and also have them arrive on time at the stand or runway?

A Game in Development

This game is being currently being worked on and does honestly still have some bugs. If you want to wait for a more polished game please wishlist the game.

Airports Around the World

Try controlling the ground movement of 5 different airports (London City, Melbourne, Helsinki, Vancouver and Seoul). The layout of each airport challenging in it's own way.

Point and Click

The game has a simple point and click system to make it easy to get started. If things feel a bit too easy or too hard the arrival rate can be change both before and while controlling. In addition to the endless mode, there are aircraft movement and time-based game modes as well.

Give and take from the tower controller

Remember to handoff airplanes to tower when they get close to their assigned departure runway or are about to cross an active runway.

Changing situation

Turn on the automatic change of arrival rate to have a variation of hectic and calm times during the session.

Set Highscores

The scoring system is based on the difference between the actual time of arrival to a stand or runway and the slot time of the aircraft. Try to be as close to the slot time as possible but do not be late. And if a collision occurs your session is ended.

Good luck!
